name: Bits n Bullets
description: Fancy a retro type of pigeon shooting VR game? Then Bits n Bullets is for you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 4-core CPU (including dual-core processors with hyperthreading) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 250 MB available space
